body_html:
I don't find this possible breaking of sharing argument too compelling.
data_parallel also mutates the storages that param tensors use, so if you wrap part of your model in data_parallel, and share parameters in wrapped and unwrapped parts, that would break too, but we are not particularly concerned about it?
